title: Episode #22.  Hampton Native Speaks Out
description:
You asked to hear more about the Murdaugh family history. We talked with someone born and raised in Hampton. Sara Holstein Graves, a historian and genealogist, runs down the Murdaugh family tree and gives the locals a voice in this tragedy.


Support this podcast at — https://redcircle.com/the-murdaugh-family-murders-impact-of-influence/donations

Advertising Inquiries: https://redcircle.com/brands
